note: Added po config object: enabled, max_questionary_rounds (3), confidence_threshold (0.85), scope_output_format (json), skip_on_effort ([turbo])
PO-Questionary dialogue loop orchestrator. Reads po config via jq, enforces round cap, checks confidence threshold, writes scope-document.json, outputs JSON summary.
Renders PO user_presentation JSON to formatted markdown for AskUserQuestion. Maps type/content/options/context fields. Enforces Owner-first proxy pattern.
Dependency graph validator using Kahn's algorithm (jq-based topological sort). Detects cycles, missing refs, orphan phases, disconnected critical paths. Bash 3.2 compatible.
